author: alja
body:
A FWMagField::m_source was not updated in FWMagField::checkFieldInfo(). This flag was read in the Track proxy builder which did field estimation instead of getting field from event data:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/CMSSW_7_5_X/Fireworks/Tracks/plugins/FWTrackProxyBuilder.cc#L65

![unnamed](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2516492/8340175/928d9d48-1a71-11e5-9682-a7b70b491ee3.png)
title: Fix bug in Track's magnetic field determination
